Name: Emberheart Berserker
Story Background: Hailing from the volcanic mountains, the Emberheart Berserkers are known for their fiery tempers and relentless nature in battle.
Ability: Whenever Emberheart Berserker attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Mountain you control.
Appearance Description: The Emberheart Berserker is a rugged warrior with flame-like tattoos covering their body, wielding a flaming sword that leaves trails of fire as it moves.
